description:
The rest of the team leave Rei and Hackmon to face Biomon as they race forward, but Eri and Dokamon are confronted by Beautymon, and Torajiro and Musimon are stopped by Fakemon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Return of the Ultimate Four! Cloud`s Challenge!
アルティメット4再び! クラウドの挑戦状!
